```c
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
  int z = 10;
  float sums[z];
  
  for(int i=0; i < z; i++)
  {
    sums[i] = 0;
    sums[i] += i*i;
    sums[i] += 0.3;
    printf("%f\n", sums[i]);
  }
  return 0;
}
```
